desc: Established in 1993, long before the current trend in plant based startups, we have been pioneering vegan meat, fish, cheese and dairy alternatives for over 25 years. We specialise in Vegan meat free, dairy free food. Perfect for Vegans, Vegetarians, flexitarians.

layout.text: Buy 1 meal in a can, of VBites Cheezly Beans and we will give 1 can to the Ukrainian Refugees.
